statement.tex: Find the intervals in which the function \[ \qquad f(x) = \fx \] is strictly increasing and decreasing

options.tex:
%text $f(x) = \fx$ will be strictly increasing/decreasing under the following conditions % \begin{align} \begin{tabular}{cN}
\hline & \text{Condition} \\ \hline \text{Strictly increasing} & 12 x\cdot (x+1)\cdot (x-2) \geq 0 \\ \hline \text{Strictly decreasing} & 12 x\cdot (x+1)\cdot (x-2) \leq 0 \\ \hline \end{tabular} \end{align} %text %
